revision.text:
[[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Lentvora''' is a village and municipality in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]] [[File:Evanjelický kostol - Lentvora.jpg|thumb|center|250px|Lutheran Church in Lentvora]]




{{commons category|Lentvora}} ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Lucenec District}} {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}} {{coord|48|23|N|19|27|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Lučenec District]]
